items.title: Farmers’ Mental Health Crumbles Under Climate Strain
items.description: Nearly half of UK farmers say they lack access to formal mental health support as floods and droughts fuel growing climate anxiety. Medscape News UK

items.title: Will There Be Enough GPs Left in 5 Years?

items.title: Phase 3 Data Support Oral Therapy for Psoriasis

items.title: Lives Lost to America’s Blood Pressure Divide
items.description: About 58% of Black adults in the US have high blood pressure. Medscape Medical News
